description: Paris Jones is one serious slab of lean muscle, with barely an ounce of body fat on his frame. A martial artist from Russia, he spends his days training, learning discipline and preparing his body to become a better fighter. He shows off some of his skills here, as well as the chiseled body he has to work with, and after his work out he decides to show a little more than just his fighting stance. He peels off his gi and pats the sweat on his forehead, then lowers himself against the punching bag and spreads his legs, his cock already hard and swelling, ready to burst as he lays on the mat. Spreading his fingers around the head of his cock, he strokes feverishly as his whole body heats up, then shoots his load in a sprawling mess all over his stomach and chest before cleaning up, wiping off and preparing for another day of training and work.Enjoy!
title: Paris Jones
